extendedInfo.description: * Create emblems.* save playercard to sd card.* move to SD card.* share playercard.keywords: black, blackops, black ops, treyarch, activision, modern warfare 2, mw2, mw3, modern warfare, cod4, call of duty, cod, montage, sick, clips, black ops montage, production, productions, no scope, quick scope, drag scope, machinimarespawn, machinima, hutch, optic, opticgaming, hecz, countdown, best, jumpshot, dropshot, epic, camper

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Controls are horrible go to move up a tad and the selected layer is across the screen. Plus how you select a color poorly done as well. Lastely the graphics and detailed is disgusting looks like it came out of the original gameboy pocket. Totally a waste of money and time.
